# threadgroupMemoryLength

**Instance Property**

The per-tile size, in bytes, of the persistent threadgroup memory allocation.

## Declaration

```swift
var threadgroupMemoryLength: Int { get set }
```

## Specifying tile shading parameters

- **imageblockSampleLength**: The per-sample size, in bytes, of the largest explicit imageblock layout in the render pass.
- **tileWidth**: The tile width, in pixels.
- **tileHeight**: The tile height, in pixels.
